Thanks to: SlapShotz54 and Gizmo the Lemur!

I will add to this from time to time. Anyone with more listings please reply to the topic, and I will incorporate the info and delete replys until the chart is complete.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, October 14, 2004 - 04:25 pm:

This still needs work! I am doing the Hengers right now, but there are plenty more monsters that need testing!

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, October 16, 2004 - 11:02 pm:

Hengers done. Starting Pixies. Re-working the chart.

By Bethegus on Tuesday, June 21, 2005 - 08:22 pm:

I slated my Magna from MR1. I got a Magna in MR2. Just wanted to add. I'll work on it more as I get further in MR1. Oh yeah, the purebreed Doodle slates as Scribble.

By Bethegus on Tuesday, June 21, 2005 - 08:35 pm:

Sorry for double post but Scribble (Monol/???) slates as a regular Monol (Monol/Monol). Pixel (Gali/Pixie) slates as a Pink Mask (Gali/Pixie). Tubby (Worm/Jell) slates as a Jelly Worm (Worm/Jell). Aqua (Gali/Jell) slates as Aqua Mask (Gali/Jell) The Magnas in both games are Golem/Worm. And Scribble is Monol/??? for the MR2 of course.

By Vincent Vega on Sunday, February 19, 2006 - 06:32 pm:

Evil Hare (hare/monol) slates over as an evil hare.
